song.title: Crystal Dragon
song.info:
Intriguing samples-comments : [code]Note: Originally made in mono (ST3 didn't have panning back then)
An oversized, heavy tune made for just the fun of it... or maybe not.[/code]
This oversized tune was inspired by... money! There was a little music compo in Finland, and I participated with this song. The music's style is somewhat medieval and very heavy indeed.
